bg.comment: Primary background — deep neutral black with cinematic tone

surface.comment: Elevated surfaces such as cards or panels

surfaceAlt.comment: Alternate surface tone for hover states

divider.comment: Subtle grid lines, separators, and borders

primary.comment: Main body and heading text — soft white for readability

secondary.comment: Muted gray for metadata and subtext

inverse.comment: Used inside bright UI elements like gradient buttons

blue.comment: Engineering accent color — precise and cool

amber.comment: Cinematic accent color — warm and expressive

gradient.comment: Hybrid accent for hero text and key highlights

blue.comment: Subtle ambient lighting for engineering sections

amber.comment: Subtle ambient lighting for cinematic sections

soft.comment: Default shadow for surfaces and cards

strong.comment: Deeper cinematic shadow for elevated elements
